attributes.action: to stop the mergers of bank licenses when one institution takes over another with urgent effect of Nationwide, Derbyshire and Chshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In view of the fact that the governement wants us all to save for our retirement and the concept that they have to bail out banksin the past would it not be possible to stop the banks and building societies merging their licenses, there are not enough banks and building socieities for some people iwth large amounts of savings.  This is urgent with respect of Nationwide, Deryshire and Cheshire merger and amalgumating the licnese
